body: DBMS which doesn't support transactions for schema changes is MySQL. If there are `safeUp()` and `safeDown()` implemented, migration is executing just fine so I'd change template to use safe methods by default.
Is there any real reason to have separate safe and "non-safe" migrations?

issue.title: Refactor migrations template

repository.name: yii2
repository.description: Yii 2: The Fast, Secure and Professional PHP Framework

issue.body:
Generate "safe" methods uncommented by default.

| Q             | A
| ------------- | ---
| Is bugfix?    | no
| New feature?  | yes
| Breaks BC?    | no
| Tests pass?   | yes
| Fixed issues  | #13827 

- [x] Uncomment safe methods by default.
- [x] Prettify docs a bit.
- [x] Update tests.

issue.title: Document that safeUp() and safeDown() do not work transactionally in migrations for some DBs

repository.name: yii2
repository.description: Yii 2: The Fast, Secure and Professional PHP Framework

issue.body:
See #13827.

There should be only `up()` and `down()` left. Transaction should be attempted automatically.

body:
in my opinion it truly make sense to have unsafe migration methods.
Not anyone is aware of the fact that ddl statements are not transactionable, so the non-safe methods are an indicator for other developers in your team to ask you. "why we do not use the safe methods?"
Well, I guess that was the case why these were added. It could be solved with a comment about MySQL in docs and phpdoc.

issue.title: Use safeUp/safeDown methods by default for migration templates

labels.name: status:ready for adoption
labels.description: Feel free to implement this issue.

repository.name: yii2
repository.description: Yii 2: The Fast, Secure and Professional PHP Framework

issue.body:
In #13827 was added behavior to generate safe methods by default.

Maybe also add this to any migrations templates?

I think this good idea. 

Also MySQL from 8 version will be with  transnationally DDL.

https://github.com/yiisoft/yii2/blob/master/framework/views/dropTableMigration.php#L30
https://github.com/yiisoft/yii2/blob/master/framework/views/dropTableMigration.php#L42
